snippet: The pay television operator Astro Malaysia's $1.5 billion I.P.O. ranks as Malaysia's third-largest this year, as the country has emerged as a surprise home for leading initial public offerings.
abstract: The pay television operator Astro Malaysia's $1.5 billion I.P.O. ranks as Malaysia's third-largest this year, as the country has emerged as a surprise home for leading initial public offerings.

headline.main: Malaysian Pay TV Company Astro Raises $1.5 Billion in I.P.O.
